parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.27

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add next frame to map animation.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[mapAnimAdd]] [time, zoom, position]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [time, zoom, position]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> time: [[Number]] - animation duration in seconds

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> zoom: [[Number]] - range from 0.01 (max. zoom) to 1 (zoomed out)

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> position: [[Position2D]], [[Position3D]] or [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[mapAnimAdd]] [1, 0.1, [[markerPos]] "anim1"];
[[mapAnimCommit]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[mapAnimAdd]] [3, 0.01, [[player]]];
[[mapAnimCommit]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[mapAnimClear]], [[mapAnimCommit]], [[mapAnimDone]], [[ctrlMapAnimAdd]], [[ctrlMapAnimClear]], [[ctrlMapAnimCommit]], [[ctrlMapAnimDone]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dd class="notedate">Posted on 05:26, 2 February 2007</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Ceeeb|Ceeeb]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
In '''OFP v1.96''', the mapAnim series of commands, together with [[forceMap]] can only be used in the intro and mission, as it is not possible to access the map from the outro. ''(not checked, sourced from an old copy of the OFPEC comref)''

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
